item.title: Next.js Is Your New Secret Weapon for Building Awesome Web Apps
item.description:

If you’re building a web application today, you’re juggling a lot. You need speed, great SEO, and a fantastic user experience, all without wanting to pull your hair out during development. This is where Next.js, the React framework, comes in and completely changes the game.
